main.name: Pablo Dom√≠nguez
main.bio: Since I remember, I've always loved technology. I was fascinated, like a wizard, you can create spaces and forms that didn't exist before. I was 5 years old when I broke my first computer, 9 when I created my very first HTML page, and 11 when I made my very first videogame. Since then I've learned "a few more things" and I'm confident we could work towards a solution that will fit your needs.
main.contactmessage: I'm always all ears to new exciting opportunities, so feel free to leave a message downs here.

resume.skillmessage: I'm always open to new opportunities to grow and improve.

education.description: Bases in software engineering, computer science, and mathematics. Main programming languages used: Java and JavaScript.

work.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
work.description: Developing cloud based applications for the agricultural sector.

work.title: Sr. Front-End Software Engineer
work.description: Develop applications for the fintech industry.

work.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
work.description: Maintaining the applications I've developed here while working as a Jr. Software Engineer.

work.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
work.description: Developed algorithms and applications that now allow real-time traceability for complex data. Built an API and a system that connects different machines to it, where the data is then processed. Developed a dashboard to visualize the information classified with the previous programs in order to facilitate the information to the employees of different areas and improve the quality control of the plant.

work.title: Fullstack Software Engineer (Intern)
work.description: Developed a system that allows the employees to do paperwork digitally, saving them time and money.

work.title: DevOps Engineer
work.description: Wrote documentation and prepared myself on different technologies and tools to be used in the future.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
